about_the_game:
Vasrak Kingdom: Battle on the Frontier Demo

Experience the core content of Vasrak Kingdom: Battle on the Frontier in this demo version.

Features

Combat System

  • Engage in battles using Tic-Tac-Toe-inspired rules.

  • Summon and position soldiers to capture lines and defeat your enemies.

Deck-Building Elements

  • Collect soldier cards and strategically build the perfect deck.

Real-Time Strategy Gameplay

  • React quickly to enemy movements in a dynamic battlefield.

Story and Worldbuilding

  • Immerse yourself in a resource war story featuring adorable hamsters.

What You Can Experience in the Demo

  • An introduction to the early combat tutorial.

  • Play battles using various types of soldier cards.

Notes

  • The demo does not include all features of the full game.

  • The full version offers additional cards, collections, and an expanded story.

short_description: A real-time strategy game combining deck-building mechanics. Summon soldiers to control a 3x3 battlefield and deal damage by completing lines using Tic-Tac-Toe rules. Make quick decisions and build your deck strategically to protect the kingdom’s resources.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
